TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit QualificationDataItem extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示管线段的开发人员提供给宿主使用的信息。

span.span: Represents information supplied by the developer of a pipeline segment, for use by the host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个限定数据项都包含一个名称/值对，该名称/值对通过使用属性应用于管道段 ，以便提供限定段 (的信息，例如，段) 的推荐隔离级别。Each item of qualification data consists of a name/value pair that was applied to a pipeline segment by using the attribute, to provide information that qualifies the use of the segment (for example, the recommended isolation level for the segment). 结构包含一个名称/值对以及它所应用到的管线段的类型。The structure contains one name/value pair and the type of pipeline segment it was applied to. 使用 属性可获取嵌套字典集，其中包含 与关联的管线段的结构 。Use the property to get a nested set of dictionaries that contains structures for the pipeline segments associated with an . 此外，还 可以使用方法获取 与标记相关联的管道段的结构的枚举器，或者只需使用 `foreach` Visual Basic 中 (的语句 `For Each` ， `for each` Visual C++) 将令牌视为结构的集合 。Alternatively, use the method to get an enumerator for the structures of the pipeline segments associated with a token, or simply use a `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in Visual C++) to treat the token as if it were a collection of structures. ## Examples 下面的示例列出了与标记集合中的每个关联的管道段的限定数据 。The following example lists the qualification data for the pipeline segments associated with each in a collection of tokens. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#12)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#12)]

summary.span: 获取限定数据项的名称。

The name of the qualification data item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个限定数据项都由一个名称/值对组成，该名称/值对通过使用属性应用于管道段 来向外接程序的使用者提供信息。Each item of qualification data consists of a name/value pair that was applied to a pipeline segment by using the attribute, to provide information to consumers of the add-in. 属性获取名称。The property gets the name. 使用 属性来获取值。Use the property to get the value. ## Examples 下面的示例列出了与标记集合中的每个关联的管道段的限定数据 。The following example lists the qualification data for the pipeline segments associated with each in a collection of tokens. 属性用于显示每个项的名称。The property is used to display the name of each item. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值标识限定数据项所应用到的管线段。

span.span: Gets a value that identifies the pipeline segment the qualification data item was applied to.

value.span: 数据项所应用到的管线段的类型。

span.span: The kind of pipeline segment the data item was applied to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举限定数据时，请使用此属性来标识属于特定管道段的限定数据。When you enumerate qualification data, use this property to identify the qualification data that belongs to a particular segment of the pipeline. > [!NOTE] > 外接程序模型不使用应用于外接程序的宿主视图的限定数据。The add-in model does not use qualification data that is applied to the host view of the add-in. 因此，枚举限定数据时，将找不到任何属性为的项 。As a result, when you enumerate qualification data you will not find any items whose property is . ## Examples 下面的示例列出了与标记集合中的每个关联的管道段的限定数据 。The following example lists the qualification data for the pipeline segments associated with each in a collection of tokens. 属性用于显示段的种类。The property is used to display the kind of segment. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#12)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#12)]
